tool_description: Edits and revises knowledge base article content based on specific instructions, incorporating new information, fixing errors, improving clarity, and updating outdated sections while preserving formatting and structure.

article_id.description: ID of the article to edit

edit_instructions.description: Specific editing instructions or changes to make

new_information.description: New information to incorporate into the article

sections_to_update.description: Specific sections of the article to focus edits on

preserve_formatting.description: Whether to maintain existing formatting and structure

edit_type.description: Type of editing to perform: minor_fixes, content_update, major_revision, or restructure

target_word_count.description: Target word count for the edited article (100-5000)

tone.description: Desired tone for the content: professional, friendly, technical, or conversational

include_examples.description: Whether to add practical examples where appropriate

update_timestamps.description: Whether to update last modified timestamps

language_style.description: Language style to maintain: formal, casual, or technical

error_messages: Article not found: The specified article_id does not exist in the knowledge base.
Invalid edit instructions: At least one edit instruction must be provided and maximum 20 allowed.
Invalid edit type: Use one of [minor_fixes, content_update, major_revision, restructure].
Invalid word count target: target_word_count must be between 100 and 5000 if specified.
Invalid tone: Use one of [professional, friendly, technical, conversational].
Invalid language style: Use one of [formal, casual, technical].
Edit conflict: Another user is currently editing this article.
Content too large: The edited content exceeds maximum allowed size.
usage: Provide article_id and edit_instructions to revise article content. Use new_information and sections_to_update to focus changes. Set preserve_formatting, edit_type, and other parameters to control editing behavior. The tool creates a draft version with applied changes.

draft_version_id.description: ID of the created draft version

changes_made.description: Summary of specific changes applied to the content

word_count_change.description: Difference in word count from original to edited version

sections_modified.description: List of article sections that were modified
